channel.title: Products and Solutions on Fil Bezerianos | Public Hub
channel.description: Recent content in Products and Solutions on Fil Bezerianos | Public Hub

item.title: Product Work Focus Tool
item.description: An AI-powered tool that analyses your product vision and strategy to prioritise features by impact. It automatically evaluates new features, calculating their overall impact and priority, saving product teams time and effort.

item.title: AI-Powered Property Photo Analyser
item.description: Property Visual Finder uses a fine-tuned vision AI model to analyse property photos and identify specific features, enabling advanced, data-driven property ranking, and searches based on visual characteristics.

item.title: Cloud Migration Strategy AI Tool
item.description: An AI-powered tool designed to determine the optimal Cloud migration strategy for applications. It analyses application details and aligns them with the organisation’s Cloud goals to deliver tailored recommendations.

item.title: Agents Duo
item.description: Agents Duo is a personal project where two AI chat agents engage in real-time discussions and debates on various topics. Users can customize the tone, style, and LLM model of each agent to make things even more engaging.

item.title: Relationships Mapping and Visualisation Tool
item.description: A tool that leverages AI to transform unstructured interview data into a visual overview diagram, expediting the analysis of structures and processes and enabling the identification of inefficiencies.

item.title: Dad Jokes Chatty
item.description: PunGPT is personal project built for fun and powered by a lightweight LLaMA model, it delivers puns and dad jokes on demand, and sometimes when you least expect them. All wrapped in a clean, familiar chat UI.

item.title: Product Transformation and Delivery
item.description: Leading impactful initiatives to bring ideas to life. I have worked with diverse organisations across industries to design modern product structures and deliver effective and innovative solutions on time and within budget.

item.title: Technology and Product Modernisation
item.description: Driving innovation and transformation through cutting-edge modernisation programs. I have delivered scalable solutions, enhanced user experiences, and aligned business strategies with evolving market demands.
